    • 方法详细资料

      • vatTransferCredit

        public VatTransferDto vatTransferCredit(Context respCtx,
                               VatTransferDto dto)
                                 throws ApplicationException
        从接口复制的说明: VatCreditService
        There are 2 kinds of credit: sale and payout. Sale and its corresponding cancellation will affect sale credit, payout/validation and its corresponding cancellation will affect payout credit.

        Refer to CreditService.credit(String, long, BigDecimal, String, boolean, boolean, boolean) for more information.

        指定者:
        vatTransferCredit 在接口中 VatCreditService
        抛出:
        ApplicationException

      • cancelOrReverse

        public boolean cancelOrReverse(Context<?> respCtx,
                      Transaction targetTrans)
                        throws ApplicationException
        从接口复制的说明: ReversalOrCancelStrategy
        Cancel the target transaction.
        指定者:
        cancelOrReverse 在接口中 ReversalOrCancelStrategy
        参数:
        respCtx - The context of cancellation request.
        targetTrans - The transaction which is intended to be cancelled.
        返回:
        true if cancel declined, or false.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException
